jay-z: tufamerica inc alleges in a lawsuit filed on wednesday that jay zs run this town samples the 1969 song hook & sling more than a dozen times. the song recorded by eddie bo is now owned by tufamerica who bought the rights 15 years ago.  unlike many other such lawsuits the allegedly lifted samples are not easy to discern. in fact im having a hard time finding any sonic similarities in the two tracks.  what do you think  peep the two songs and see if you can make out the alleged illegal samples. use the suggestion box below to tell us if you agree with the lawsuit. listen to eddie bos hook & sling.listen run this town.
